A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Complete disservice to the original fan base and new fans alike. Rian rebooted the franchise without any consideration to the story and characters J.J. left for him. The movie has an issue with its own identity\, with too many ill-timed quips and plot holes; Disney is a cancer to the franchise. It is apparent that Disney has traded quality storytelling for merchandising and social agenda... the true First Order of our time.
